roleset.name: tolerate, put up with, the act of tolerating
roleset.note: TOLERATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'tolerate' based on financial subcorpus; adjectival 'tolerant' based on BOLT-2,3; adjectival 'tolerated' based on medi-seedcorpus. Member of Vncls admire-31.2, allow-64. (from tolerate.01-v)

TOLERANCE-N NOTES: Based on Bolt data. Comparison to tolerate.01-v. Tolerate is a member of VN classes admire-31.2 and allow-64. Tolerate is a member of FN class Tolerating. Framed by Katie. (from tolerance.01-n)
TOLERANT-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from tolerant.01-j)
TOLERATED-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from tolerated.01-j)

example.name: they pretty much all look like this
example.text: Even with mutual funds, [the little investor]-1 continues *trace*-1 to tolerate high fees, high commissions and poor performance, while index-fund managers slowly amass a better record with lower fees, lower commissions and less risk.
example.arg: high fees , high commissions and poor performance

example.name: adjectival rel: tolerant
example.text: My eldest who-1 [*-1] is especially friendly and tolerant tried to make friends with these people but in the end they all wanted something .

example.name: adjectival rel: tolerated
example.text: The procedure was well tolerated without immediate complications .

example.name: arg 0
example.text: His tolerance only extends so far.

example.name: Arg 1 only
example.text: But I also did a no tolerance on whining campaign and put him in a t/o chair every single time he whined.

roleset.name: able to be tolerated
roleset.note: TOLERABLE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-7. (from tolerable.01-j)

example.name: arg1
example.text: Last year , the consumer price index exceeded 5 % , which-1 [*-1] was barely tolerable .
